mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mingcheng AS "menpai", a.huxing AS "huxing", a.pids AS "pids", a.chanquanzheng AS "chanquanzheng", CONCAT(c.mingcheng,'-',b.mingcheng) AS "weizhi", f.xingming AS "huzhu.xingming", f.suishendh AS "huzhu.suishendh", a.fangjianlx AS "fangjianlx", a.yongtu AS "yongtu", a.zhuangxiuqk AS "zhuangxiuqk", a.jiaofangsj AS "jiaofangsj", a.xiaoshouzt AS "xiaoshouzt", a.shiyongzt AS "shiyongzt", e.num AS "num", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu b ON b.id = a.pid LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu c ON c.id = b.pid LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(id)num,pid FROM dict_renyuan GROUP BY pid) e ON e.pid = a.id LEFT JOIN dict_renyuan f ON f.pid=a.id
mapper.select: SELECT id,parent_id AS dizhi,parent_ids as "dianhua",name as "mingcheng",1 as "renshu" from sys_office WHERE type=1 AND del_flag=0 union SELECT id, pid AS "dizhi", pids AS "dianhua", mingcheng, leixingbs AS "renshu" FROM wuye_jichu a where del_flag = 0 AND leixingbs < #{leixingbs} ORDER BY mingcheng

SELECT
FROM wuye_jichu a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.leixingbs=4
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wuye_jichu( id, mingcheng, huxing, shiyongpm, jianzhupm, gongtanpm, jifeipm, chanquanzheng, pid, pids, fangjianlx, yongtu, zhuangxiuqk, cenggao, jiaofangsj, tupian, xiaoshouzt, shiyongzt, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, leixingbs ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{menpai}, #{huxing}, #{shiyongpm}, #{jianzhupm}, #{gongtanpm}, #{jifeipm}, #{chanquanzheng}, #{pid}, #{pids}, #{fangjianlx}, #{yongtu}, #{zhuangxiuqk}, #{zongcg}, #{jiaofangsj}, #{tupian}, #{xiaoshouzt}, #{shiyongzt}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag},4 )
mapper.update: UPDATE wuye_jichu SET mingcheng = #{menpai}, huxing = #{huxing}, shiyongpm = #{shiyongpm}, jianzhupm = #{jianzhupm}, gongtanpm = #{gongtanpm}, jifeipm = #{jifeipm}, chanquanzheng = #{chanquanzheng}, fangjianlx = #{fangjianlx}, yongtu = #{yongtu}, zhuangxiuqk = #{zhuangxiuqk}, cenggao = #{zongcg}, jiaofangsj = #{jiaofangsj}, tupian = #{tupian}, xiaoshouzt = #{xiaoshouzt}, shiyongzt = #{shiyongzt}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
